description: A collection of prefight rule data objects.

properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.
properties.name: length

methods.description: Add a new preflight rule data to a preflight profile rule.

parameters.description: The name of the rule data to add
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: The value of data. Can accept: String, Real, Long Integer, Short Integer, Boolean, Object or Array of Strings, Reals, Long Integers, Short Integers, Booleans, Objects or Arrays of Array of Arrays of Array of Strings, Reals, Long Integers, Short Integers, Booleans or Objects.
parameters.name: dataValue

parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new RuleDataObject (Optional)
parameters.name: withProperties

methods.name: add

methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the RuleDataObject.
methods.name: count

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified index or name.

parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: index

methods.name: item

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified name.
methods.name: itemByName

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified ID.
methods.name: itemByID

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObjects within the specified range.

parameters.description: The RuleDataObject, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: RuleDataObject, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: The RuleDataObject, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: RuleDataObject, Long Integer or String.
parameters.name: to

methods.name: itemByRange

methods.description: Returns the first RuleDataObject in the collection.
methods.name: firstItem

methods.description: Returns the last RuleDataObject in the collection.
methods.name: lastItem

methods.description: Returns the middle RuleDataObject in the collection.
methods.name: middleItem

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.description: The index of the RuleDataObject that follows the desired RuleDataObject.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: previousItem

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject whose index follows the specified RuleDataObject in the collection.

parameters.description: The RuleDataObject whose index comes before the desired RuleDataObject.
parameters.name: obj

methods.name: nextItem

methods.description: Returns any RuleDataObject in the collection.
methods.name: anyItem

methods.description: Returns every RuleDataObject in the collection.
methods.name: everyItem

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the RuleDataObject.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Returns the RuleDataObject with the specified index.

name: RuleDataObjects
